elements.name: beliefs_influence_teaching_0

elements.name: believe_mental_models_equitible_0

How much do you agree or disagree with the following statements about the {workshop_course} curriculum?
elements.name: curriculum_satisfaction

rows.text: This curriculum is going to be effective for my students.
Through my participation in this workshop I am better able to impact the barriers to access, diversity, and inclusion that students face in my CS classroom.
After attending this workshop I have developed a recruitment plan to influence the diversity of the students in my current or future {workshop_course} classroom.

elements.name: Intro_teaching_ap
elements.html: How much do you agree or disagree with the following statements about teaching an AP Computer Science course?

elements.name: ap_exam_pacing
elements.title: I have a plan to ensure I keep my class on track to finish the content before the AP exam.

elements.name: student_success_ap_exam
elements.title: I am confident my students can be successful on the AP {workshop_course} exam.

elements.name: support_preparation_ap_exam
elements.title: I will need a lot of extra support to prepare students for the AP exam and performance tasks.
How much do you agree or disagree with the following statements about teaching the {workshop_course} course?
elements.name: overall_feedback_csa

rows.text: I feel better prepared to teach my {workshop_course} class after attending this workshop.
I had the opportunity to share my challenges, solutions, and ideas with peers during this workshop.
The content of this workshop effectively supports me at what I plan to teach at this time of the year.

elements.name: content_helpful
elements.title: Out of the content covered in this workshop, what topics did you learn or discuss that were most helpful to you as a teacher?

elements.name: content_not_covered
elements.title: What were you hoping to learn or discuss today that we did not cover in this workshop?

elements.name: postwork_complete
elements.title: After the prior module, you received some post-work. Did you complete it?

choices.text: I completed all or some of the post-work
I didn't know there was post-work
I was aware there was post-work but decided not to do it

elements.name: postwork_comment
elements.title: If you have any thoughts on how we can improve the post-work to be more helpful to participants in future workshops, please use this space to share them.
